name: LIBERO Mail Minimal ZERO (by Atino Core)
description:
Easy use of LIBERO Mail. Area extended, NO ads, NO BOTHERING STUFFS... Other Styles: [see all]
■ - Yahoo! Mail Minimal ■ - Yahoo! Mail Minimal Zero ■ - Yahoo! Mail Zero Carbonella ■ - Yahoo! Mail Minimal One ■ - Rai TV Streaming ■ - LIBERO Mail ZERO CARBONELLA ■ - Speed Test OOKLA cleaner ■ - LA7 Essenziale Forte
additional_info: Video: LIBERO Mail Minimal ZERO / ZERO CARB February 2016. Tested on FireFox and Chrome (with or without AdBlock) works fine. This version displays mail-area extended. no advertising box, no site-bar, it has search-box with mail-search button, it has options and account buttons, no navigation tabs, no Information Layer, no footer. suitable for pc, tablets and netbooks, for an easy use of Libero Mail. PLEASE Report any problems or suggestions here. thanks. ...see also: MY OTHER STYLES
